page.title: 01Farmland n/wst of Oldmeldrum
page.content: Comprised of low rolling hills (400-500ft alt) on nth and south sides with est/west shallow open farmland with buildings is locted just now of small country town. Large fields separated by stone walls (dry stane dykes) sw corner has deciduous trees. Farming units are medium to large,no crofts. cropland (wheat,barley.turnips,potatoes,oilseed rape) predominates over pasture (dairy and beef cattle,pigs,some sheep. Of 50 dwellings mostly granite28% are farmhouses, 58% aer cottaes (nr half occuped by farm employees, nearly half rented, few empty) 8% are unoccupied farmhuses/crofts, 6% new(or converted houses. popultion primarily farm related-owners or workers & families. One feature is Mounie Cstle with outside curling rink.2km B road rest C.
